article_title: Presentation: Revenue cycle success depends on physician engagement
article_text: According to Frank Massey, senior vice president and general manager at MedeAnalytics, improving physician engagement is key to tightening up a healthcare provider's revenue cycle operations in the mid-cycle and improving cash flow. Massey gave the detailed presentation, "Future-Proofing Cash: Connecting Financial and Clinical Leadership," at last week's Revenue Cycle Solutions Summit at the HIMSS15 conference. Here are his slides, for those who could not make the event.

og.description: MedeAnalytics VP says improving the mid-cycle is important as financial outcomes are increasingly dependent on clinical operations.

article_summary:
Massey gave the detailed presentation, "Future-Proofing Cash: Connecting Financial and Clinical Leadership," at last week's Revenue Cycle Solutions Summit at the HIMSS15 conference.
According to Frank Massey, senior vice president and general manager at MedeAnalytics, improving physician engagement is key to tightening up a healthcare provider's revenue cycle operations in the mid-cycle and improving cash flow.
Here are his slides, for those who could not make the event.
